payload.content: AGENTS.md is an open format designed to guide coding agents, serving as a 'README for agents' by providing context and instructions for AI coding agents to work on a project.

name: AGENTS.md is an open format designed to guide coding agents, serving as a 'READM
content: AGENTS.md is an open format designed to guide coding agents, serving as a 'README for agents' by providing context and instructions for AI coding agents to work on a project.

payload.content: AGENTS.md is used by over 60,000 open-source projects.

name: AGENTS.md is used by over 60,000 open-source projects.
content: AGENTS.md is used by over 60,000 open-source projects.

payload.content: README.md files are intended for human users, providing quick starts, project descriptions, and contribution guidelines.

name: README.md files are intended for human users, providing quick starts, project de
content: README.md files are intended for human users, providing quick starts, project descriptions, and contribution guidelines.

payload.content: AGENTS.md complements README.md by containing detailed context specifically for coding agents, such as build steps, tests, and conventions, which might otherwise clutter a README or be irrelevant to human contributors.

name: AGENTS.md complements README.md by containing detailed context specifically for
content: AGENTS.md complements README.md by containing detailed context specifically for coding agents, such as build steps, tests, and conventions, which might otherwise clutter a README or be irrelevant to human contributors.

payload.content: The AGENTS.md format is intentionally separated from README.md to provide agents with a clear, predictable instruction location, keep READMEs concise for human contributors, and offer precise, agent-focused guidance that complements existing documentation.

name: The AGENTS.md format is intentionally separated from README.md to provide agents
content: The AGENTS.md format is intentionally separated from README.md to provide agents with a clear, predictable instruction location, keep READMEs concise for human contributors, and offer precise, agent-focused guidance that complements existing documentation.

payload.content: AGENTS.md is compatible with a growing ecosystem of AI coding agents and tools, including Gemini CLI, Autopilot & Coded Agents, Semgrep, Factory, RooCode, Jules, Devin, Codex, Zed, goose, Warp, Cursor, Aider, Ona, Windsurf, opencode, Coding agent (GitHub Copilot), Kilo Code, Amp, Phoenix, and VS Code.

name: AGENTS.md is compatible with a growing ecosystem of AI coding agents and tools,
content: AGENTS.md is compatible with a growing ecosystem of AI coding agents and tools, including Gemini CLI, Autopilot & Coded Agents, Semgrep, Factory, RooCode, Jules, Devin, Codex, Zed, goose, Warp, Cursor, Aider, Ona, Windsurf, opencode, Coding agent (GitHub Copilot), Kilo Code, Amp, Phoenix, and VS Code.

payload.content: To use AGENTS.md, create an AGENTS.md file at the root of the repository, add sections covering project overview, build/test commands, code style, testing instructions, and security considerations, and include extra instructions like commit messages or PR guidelines.

name: To use AGENTS.md, create an AGENTS.md file at the root of the repository, add se
content: To use AGENTS.md, create an AGENTS.md file at the root of the repository, add sections covering project overview, build/test commands, code style, testing instructions, and security considerations, and include extra instructions like commit messages or PR guidelines.

payload.content: For large monorepos, use nested AGENTS.md files for subprojects; agents automatically read the nearest file in the directory tree, giving precedence to the closest one.

name: For large monorepos, use nested AGENTS.md files for subprojects; agents automati
content: For large monorepos, use nested AGENTS.md files for subprojects; agents automatically read the nearest file in the directory tree, giving precedence to the closest one.

payload.content: To resolve conflicting instructions, the AGENTS.md file closest to the edited file takes precedence, and explicit user chat prompts override all other instructions.

name: To resolve conflicting instructions, the AGENTS.md file closest to the edited fi
content: To resolve conflicting instructions, the AGENTS.md file closest to the edited file takes precedence, and explicit user chat prompts override all other instructions.

payload.content: Agents will automatically run testing commands listed in AGENTS.md, attempting to execute relevant programmatic checks and fix failures before completing a task.

name: Agents will automatically run testing commands listed in AGENTS.md, attempting t
content: Agents will automatically run testing commands listed in AGENTS.md, attempting to execute relevant programmatic checks and fix failures before completing a task.

payload.content: To migrate existing documentation to AGENTS.md, rename the existing file to AGENTS.md and create a symbolic link for backward compatibility using the command: `mv AGENT.md AGENTS.md && ln -s AGENTS.md AGENT.md`.

name: To migrate existing documentation to AGENTS.md, rename the existing file to AGEN
content: To migrate existing documentation to AGENTS.md, rename the existing file to AGENTS.md and create a symbolic link for backward compatibility using the command: `mv AGENT.md AGENTS.md && ln -s AGENTS.md AGENT.md`.

payload.content: AGENTS.md is standard Markdown and does not have required fields; agents parse the text provided under any headings.

name: AGENTS.md is standard Markdown and does not have required fields; agents parse t
content: AGENTS.md is standard Markdown and does not have required fields; agents parse the text provided under any headings.

payload.content: If instructions conflict, the AGENTS.md file closest to the edited file takes precedence, and explicit user chat prompts override everything.

name: If instructions conflict, the AGENTS.md file closest to the edited file takes pr
content: If instructions conflict, the AGENTS.md file closest to the edited file takes precedence, and explicit user chat prompts override everything.

payload.content: To configure Aider to use AGENTS.md, add `read: AGENTS.md` to the `.aider.conf.yml` file.

name: To configure Aider to use AGENTS.md, add `read: AGENTS.md` to the `.aider.conf.y
content: To configure Aider to use AGENTS.md, add `read: AGENTS.md` to the `.aider.conf.yml` file.

payload.content: If testing commands are listed in AGENTS.md, agents will attempt to execute relevant programmatic checks and fix failures before completing a task.

name: If testing commands are listed in AGENTS.md, agents will attempt to execute rele
content: If testing commands are listed in AGENTS.md, agents will attempt to execute relevant programmatic checks and fix failures before completing a task.

payload.content: AGENTS.md should be treated as living documentation and can be updated later.

name: AGENTS.md should be treated as living documentation and can be updated later.
content: AGENTS.md should be treated as living documentation and can be updated later.

payload.content: To configure Gemini CLI to use AGENTS.md, set `"contextFileName": "AGENTS.md"` in the `.gemini/settings.json` file.

name: To configure Gemini CLI to use AGENTS.md, set `"contextFileName": "AGENTS.md"` i
content: To configure Gemini CLI to use AGENTS.md, set `"contextFileName": "AGENTS.md"` in the `.gemini/settings.json` file.
